EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal’s Transformation Practice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Week of July 27, 2015 <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-labs/pivotal-people/siobhan-mcfeeney-to-lead-pivotals-transformation-practice?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-29-2015> Siobhan McFeeney to Lead Pivotal’s Transformation Practice Our most successful customers, some of the largest and most successful companies in the world, realize the full value of Pivotal’s cloud platform, data products, and services when they get expert help addressing change management and digital transformation.
This week, we are very excited to announce the appointment of Siobhan McFeeney <http://www.zdnet.com/article/exclusive-pivotal-labs-taps-aaa-veteran-to-lead-transformation/> as the leader of our transformation practice at Pivotal Labs. In 2014, The San Francisco Business Times voted McFeeney as one of The Most Influential Women in Bay Area Business <http://www.bizjournals.com/sanfrancisco/gallery/26271>. READ MORE <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-labs/pivotal-people/siobhan-mcfeeney-to-lead-pivotals-transformation-practice?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-29-2015> Podcasts Discussing Modern Data Architecture July 29, 2015 Pivotal enterprise architect, Alexey Grishchenko joins the podcast to discuss the evolution from traditional data architectures, through advanced, Lambda and streaming architectures. He also explains how modern data stores like MPP, Apache Hadoop®, and in memory data stores fit into these modern data architectures.
Listen Now <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/discussing-modern-data-architecture?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-29-2015> CoreLogic Transforms to Agile Culture and Cloud Native Platform with Pivotal July 28, 2015 CoreLogic, an industry-leading, $1.4 billion software, data, and analytics company has reinvented the way it develops software with Pivotal. Pivotal Cloud Foundry is providing a way to automate development and deployment, reduce risk, and increase time to market. Pivotal Labs has helped the company re-invent its culture—one that is now based on agile, innovative practices surrounded by DevOps practices.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies-2/corelogic-transforms-to-agile-culture-and-cloud-native-platform-with-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-29-2015> Big Data Our Top 10 Quotes From OSCON 2015 July 27, 2015 Last week’s annual O'Reilly Open Source Convention in Portland was a hotbed of discussion on cloud-native application development, engineering culture and open software collaboration. Topics ranged from technical innovations in container orchestration and microservices, to the economic and cultural changes behind recent record growth in open-source collaboration among organizations. Check out our 10 favorite quotes from the event.
